articles.title: Coronavirus warning - the four emergency signs of deadly COVID-19 revealed - Express
articles.description: CORONAVIRUS is a deadly infection that's easily spread, and the disease has killed more than 28,000 people in the UK. There are four key emergency warning signs of COVID-19 that required immediate medical attention. Are you at risk of coronavirus symptoms?

articles.author: RT
articles.title: Nearly ONE FIFTH of British households have trouble feeding children as result of LOCKDOWN – report - RT
articles.description: A significant number of poor and vulnerable families in the UK have been suffering from food insecurity after schools were closed due to the Covid-19 pandemic, a new report has said.
articles.content:
Almost a fifth of households with children have been unable to obtain enough food in the past five weeks, the Observer (the Guardian’s sister paper) reported, citing data from London-based NGO the Food Foundation.
